text: drb allah mathalana ebdana mmlwkana lshrka' mtnazeyn, fahu hayran fi 'irdayhm, webdana khalsana lmalk wahd yerf mradh wama yrdyh, hal yastawian mthla? la ystwyan, kdhlk almshrk hu fi hayrt wshk, walmwmn fi raht watmynan. falthna' alkamil alttami lilah whdh, bal almushrikun la yaelamun alhaqa fytbewnh
